Description: A rectangular wooden shabti-box with flat sides, all coloured black on the exterior. On one of the long sides is a central panel with four columns of hieroglyphic text in yellow. This consists of an offering formula for the lady Djedamuniuesankh. The interior is plain. A small part of the lid is preserved at one end. The top on one end rises above the level of the lid, but the other end has been cut flat.
